To view an individual Student report:

  1. Use the Change report drop down list to choose View individual Student reports.
  2. You can filter the list to display either by your Teaching Group or by Registration Year.
  3. Click on the folders to open the lists of students.
  4. Click on the name of the student and a list of their reports will appear in the right hand panel.
  5. Click on the report icon (bar chart) to view the report.
